description: This module focuses on teaching programming tools to transform and explore economic data or data in general using the R software. The students will learn different data structures, conditional statement, loops, function writing, and different popular and powerful packages in R so that they are able to write their own codes and to use packagesâ€™ tools to subset and manipulate the data, and build different econometric models. They will apply the acquired knowledge to real-life data problems.
title: Economic Data Analysis with R Programming
